mapper.insert:
insert into PROJECT_INFO( owner_id, owner_type, parent_id, status, name, subtitle, present, present_format, home_page, down_page, type, language, license, futures, create_time, modify_time ) values( #{ownerID}, #{ownerType, typeHandler=net.hasor.website.datadao.convert.OwnerTypeConvert}, #{parentID}, #{status, typeHandler=net.hasor.website.datadao.convert.ProjectStatusConvert}, #{name}, #{subtitle}, #{present}, #{contentFormat, typeHandler=net.hasor.website.datadao.convert.ContentFormatConvert}, #{homePage}, #{downPage}, #{sourceType, typeHandler=net.hasor.website.datadao.convert.SourceTypeConvert}, #{language}, #{license}, #{futures, typeHandler=net.hasor.website.datadao.convert.ProjectFuturesConvert}, now(), now() );
select LAST_INSERT_ID() as value
mapper.select:
select
from PROJECT_INFO where id = #{projectID} limit 1

select
from PROJECT_INFO where 1=1 and owner_id = #{ownerID} and owner_type = #{ownerType} and status != -1 order by create_time desc

select
from PROJECT_INFO where 1=1 and status = 2
and owner_id = #{ownerID} and owner_type = #{ownerType}
order by name asc
mapper.update: update PROJECT_INFO set futures = #{projectInfo.futures, typeHandler=net.hasor.website.datadao.convert.ProjectFuturesConvert}, status = #{projectInfo.status, typeHandler=net.hasor.website.datadao.convert.ProjectStatusConvert}, modify_time = now() where 1 = 1 and id = #{projectID} limit 1
